title: The Bachelorette: Angie Kent's secret date with Bill Goldsmith revealed
text:
She will make her debut as The Bachelorette in just two days' time.

But before meeting her suitors earlier this year, Angie Kent reportedly enjoyed a 'secret date' with Bachelor in Paradise star Bill Goldsmith in Byron Bay.

According to New Idea, Angie and Bill had been exchanging messages over Instagram for months before eventually meeting up in May.

Scroll down for video

Sshh! Before meeting her suitors earlier this year, The Bachelorette's Angie Kent reportedly enjoyed a 'secret date' with Bachelor in Paradise star Bill Goldsmith in Byron Bay

Angie, 29, was in Byron Bay staying at the Gaia Retreat & Spa health centre, and was reportedly under strict instructions from Channel 10 not to leave the venue.

But Bill, 32, encouraged her to come out and finally meet in him in person as he was in the area.

'They all met at a local café for dinner and then ended up going on a pub crawl afterwards,' a source said.

'The people you run into!' According to New Idea, Angie and Bill had been exchanging messages over Instagram for months before eventually meeting up in May

The pair, who were both single at the time, apparently hit it off and shared a kiss, but they did not spend the night together.

Back in May, Bill shared a photo to Instagram of himself, Angie and Gogglebox star Isabelle Silbery in Byron Bay.

Angie later re-posted it to her own account, alongside the caption: 'The people you run into in Byron when you escape your health retreat.'

Having fun: The pair, who were both single at the time, apparently hit it off and shared a kiss, but they did not spend the night together. Pictured: Angie on The Bachelorette

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel 10 for comment.

Before being cast as The Bachelorette, Angie was famous for her appearances on Gogglebox and I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday, October 9 at 7:30pm on Channel 10
